content: The {{organizationName}} {{productName}} MCP Server streamlines AI-driven workflows, integrating LLMs with external systems for efficient and secure document management.

comment.text: This key provides a short description of the MCP Server, explaining that it streamlines AI workflows by integrating LLMs with external systems for secure document management. It appears as a description for an MCP Server tile within the AI settings portal. Translators should ensure the description accurately conveys the server's functionality in a clear and concise way.
